Speakerpos: Note 1: Speakerpos 90 is with Partner on the right (E) and 270 is with Partner on the left (W)

Note 2: Diagonal1 is with left folder (from ego perspective) on the top and right folder on the bottom (i.e., positions 1_9; see below); Diagonal2 is with right folder (from ego perspective) on the top and left folder on the bottom (i.e., positions 3_7)

Note 3: Object_arrangement lists the locations of the 3 objects as folder1_folder2_CD; numbers are based on a 3 x 3 grid superimposed on the circle, and their numbering is aligned with the observer's perspective at 0, with numbers 1, 4, 7 referring to the leftmost locations of the top to bottom rows
